text:
London's most famous plumber Charlie Mullins: Bring on #vaccine passport or pay 100 quid for a burger

“It’s a case of carry a card or pay £100 for a burger and chips," the @PimlicoPlumbers founder said https://t.co/bcDulRjlIy #VaccinePassport #CharlieMullins #COVID19 #Covid19UK https://t.co/YshyYu8UvX
